request.description: Update an existing advisor package. Only updates fields that are provided in the request body.
Retrieve a specific advisor package by Advisor_Package_id. Returns populated data with user references.

query.description: Field to sort by (created_at, packege_name, etc.)

request.description: Get all advisor packages with optional filtering and sorting. Returns statistics about active/inactive packages.
Get advisor package for the currently authenticated user. Uses req.user.user_id from JWT token.
Delete an advisor package by Advisor_Package_id. Permanently removes the package from the database.
